description.value:
The Pelt of a Fenrisian Wolf, slain as part of an unarmed hunting ritual and displayed as proof of their prowess. Adds +2 to Intimidate Tests.

Requirements

Deathwatch Initiate may start with one appropriate Chapter Trapping. Chapter: Space Wolves

Effect: Initiated

Notes: -
description.summary: The Pelt of a Fenrisian Wolf, slain as part of an unarmed hunting ritual and displayed as proof of their prowess. Adds +2 to Intimidate Tests.
